description:
40.0

A TIC-80 demake version of the game : 64.0 by Rebel Rabbit

I took the rules of the original games, and made custom levels based on original music, with the limitations of the engine

The game currently have 2 levels and a tutorial

Have fun !

Rules

  • Survive for 40.0 seconds
  • Shoot squares with the same color as the background
  • Don't shoot squares with a different color than the background

Controls

Arrow keys : Shoot

or

Controller D-pad : Shoot (NOT recommended)

or

Controller Joystick : Shoot (NOT recommended at all)

You can change the key binding by pressing escape during the game and select GAMEPAD CONFIG

You can switch to fullscreen by pressing F11

Sources

All the code and ressources are embedded in the game. You can access theme by pressing escape, selecting CLOSE GAME and typing EDIT in the console.
